sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from source_cars_data where Date_ID >  ' @{activity('Last_load').output.value[0].last_load}'  AND Date_ID <= '@{activity('current_load').output.firstRow.max_date}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(Date_ID) as max_date from source_cars_data
